PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SignalFrame
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties that define signal frame parameters for occurrences and types of IfcSignal applied in railways.

PropertyDef.Name: BackboardType
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of the backboard of the signal frame.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalFrameType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of frame, e.g. main frame, route indicator, speed indicator, direction indicator, etc.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal overall width of the object. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalIndicatorType
PropertyDef.Definition: Type of the indicators on a signal, e.g. route indicator, speed restriction indicator etc.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalFrameBackboardHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the signal frame backboard.

PropertyDef.Name: SignalFrameBackboardDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the signal frame backboard.
